content: i had fun playing with shetland stitch patterns to design this shawl and i hope you have fun knitting it this shawl is triangular and is knit from the top down with increases on every right-side row worked at the edges and on each side of the center stitch i used a handspun yarn spun from polwarth wool warning - the pattern has not been test knitted by anyone other than myself so there may be errors please let me know if you find any and i will post a corrected version please make sure you have the most recent version thanks update 12-17-2024 changed extra decreases to knits in chart 2 row 121 123 and 125 update 12-29-2024 added missing decreases in chart 1 row 59 columns 17 and 64 and in chart 3 row 61 column 31 and row 167 columns 5 and 75
